requirement: Audit logs are enabled and active for all system components and cardholder data.

api-gw-xray-enabled.details: No evidence found to confirm X-Ray tracing is enabled on Amazon API Gateway REST APIs. Missing logs may indicate security and monitoring gaps.

api-gwv2-access-logs-enabled.details: No evidence of access logging configuration for Amazon API Gateway V2 stages. Lack of access logs prevents proper audit trail tracking.

appsync-logging-enabled.details: No confirmation of AppSync API logging. Missing logging prevents comprehensive audit and monitoring capabilities.

cloudfront-accesslogs-enabled.details: CloudFront distributions not verified to have access logs configured to S3 bucket. Missing logs create potential security visibility gaps.

cloudtrail-enabled.details: No evidence of AWS CloudTrail trail being enabled in the AWS account. Critical audit logging mechanism is missing.

ecs-task-definition-log-configuration.details: ECS Task Definitions not verified to have log configuration. Lack of logging prevents tracking container activities.

eks-cluster-logging-enabled.details: EKS cluster logging not confirmed as enabled for all log types. Missing comprehensive cluster logging creates monitoring blind spots.

elastic-beanstalk-logs-to-cloudwatch.details: No verification of Elastic Beanstalk environments sending logs to CloudWatch. Missing centralized logging prevents effective audit trails.

mq-cloudwatch-audit-log-enabled.details: Amazon MQ broker CloudWatch audit logging not confirmed. Missing broker audit logs create potential security monitoring gaps.

mq-cloudwatch-audit-logging-enabled.details: Amazon MQ broker CloudWatch audit logging not confirmed. Duplicate rule suggests critical importance of logging verification.

multi-region-cloudtrail-enabled.details: No evidence of multi-region AWS CloudTrail configuration. Missing cross-region logging prevents comprehensive security monitoring.

neptune-cluster-cloudwatch-log-export-en.details: Neptune cluster CloudWatch log export for audit logs not verified. Missing database audit logs create potential security traceability issues.

netfw-logging-enabled.details: Network Firewall logging configuration not confirmed. Missing firewall logs prevent tracking potential security events.

step-functions-state-machine-logging-ena.details: Step Functions state machine logging not verified. Missing logging prevents tracking workflow and potential security events.

waf-classic-logging-enabled.details: WAF classic global web ACL logging not confirmed. Missing web access logs prevent comprehensive security monitoring.
